channel.title: Need Help hosting! Server won't become public, files & ports are 100% right
channel.description: I made a server a few hours ago, and now I've just been trying to get it online. It is not working out at all. I've tried uTorrent and I have porforwarded correctly. I've allowed no-ip and utorrent through the firewall. I dont know what to do now. If someone could help me that would be GREAT. I would very much prefer help over teamviewer or skype so they can see that I've done everything and stuff. PM me if you can help over teamviewer or skype, thanks!

item.title: Need Help hosting! Server won't become public, files & ports are 100% right
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

“100% right”
if it’s 100% right, wouldn’t it work…
Guys. I can help anyone with this.
Skype: sk8r_mopar
or PM me…

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help hosting! Server won't become public, files & ports are 100% right
item.dc:creator: @Lirimoo Lirimoo
item.description:
@Lirimoo wrote:

Easy.

Close utorrent. (Close the whole !!)
Open DUC
Run your server
Log into it
then open uTorrent.

Read full topic
